11228881Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool isClose(IEnumerable<decimal> list, decimal epislon) {Di2015NewLine  return isClose(Enumerable.Empty<decimal>(),list,0,list.Sum(),epislon);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// Define other methods and classes hereDi2015NewLinebool isClose(IEnumerable<decimal> left,IEnumerable<decimal> right, decimal leftSum,decimal rightSum, decimal epsilon) {Di2015NewLine  if (leftSum>=1-epsilon && leftSum<=1+epsilon) return true;Di2015NewLine  if (leftSum>1+epsilon) return false;Di2015NewLine  if (leftSum+right.Sum()< 1-epsilon) return false;Di2015NewLine  if (!right.Any()) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (var i=0;i<right.Count();i++) {Di2015NewLine    var skip=right.Skip(i);Di2015NewLine    var newItem=skip.First();Di2015NewLine    if (isClose(left.Concat(skip.Take(1)),skip.Skip(1),leftSum+newItem,rightSum-newItem,epsilon)) return true;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineisClose(new[] {0.7m,0.7m,0.7m},0.001m); // returns falseDi2015NewLineisClose(new[] {0.7m,0.3m,0.7m},0.001m); //returns trueDi2015NewLineisClose(new[] {0.777777m,0.2m,0.1m},0.001m); //returns falseDi2015NewLineisClose(new[] {0.33333m,0.33333m,0.33333m},0.001m); //returns trueDi2015NewLine

11232407Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static CookieCollection FixCookies(CookieCollection collection)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (Cookie cookie in collection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(cookie.Path))Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int idx = cookie.Path.LastIndexOf('/');Di2015NewLine        if (idx == -1)Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cookie.Path = cookie.Path.Substring(0, idx);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return collection;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[STAThread]Di2015NewLineprivate static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var http = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create("http://localhost/test/test.php");Di2015NewLine    http.CookieContainer = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLine    var resp = (HttpWebResponse)http.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine    http.CookieContainer.Add(FixCookies(resp.Cookies));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11232567Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IEnumerable<int[]> CombinationsFor(int n, int k);Di2015NewLineprivate int CombinationsCount(int n, int k);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate int IndexFor(int n, int[] combination)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int k = combination.Count();Di2015NewLine    int ret = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int j = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < k; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (j++; j < combination[i]; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ret += CombinationsCount(n - j, k - i - 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate IEnumerable<int> PossibleCombinations(int n, int k, int[] picked)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int m = picked.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int[] reverseMapping = Enumerable.Range(0, n)Di2015NewLine        .Where(i=>!picked.Contains(i))Di2015NewLine        .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return CombinationsFor(n-m, k-m)Di2015NewLine        .Select(c => cDi2015NewLine            .Select(x=>reverseMapping[x])Di2015NewLine            .Concat(picked)Di2015NewLine            .OrderBy(x=>x)Di2015NewLine            .ToArray()Di2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLine        .Select(c => IndexFor(n, c));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11233103Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SetSortOrder(List<GroupInfo> groupInfos, GroupInfo target, int newSortOrder)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (newSortOrder == target.SortOrder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return; // No changeDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // If newSortOrder > SortOrder, shift all GroupInfos in that range downDi2015NewLine    // Otherwise, shift them upDi2015NewLine    int sortOrderAdjustment = (newSortOrder > target.SortOrder ? -1 : 1);Di2015NewLine    // Get the range of SortOrders that must be updatedDi2015NewLine    int bottom = Math.Min(newSortOrder, target.SortOrder);Di2015NewLine    int top = Math.Max(newSortOrder, target.SortOrder);Di2015NewLine    // Get the GroupInfos that fall within our rangeDi2015NewLine    var groupInfosToUpdate = from g in groupInfosDi2015NewLine                                where g.Id != target.IdDi2015NewLine                                && g.SortOrder >= bottomDi2015NewLine                                && g.SortOrder <= topDi2015NewLine                                select g;Di2015NewLine    // Do the updatesDi2015NewLine    foreach (GroupInfo g in groupInfosToUpdate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        g.SortOrder += sortOrderAdjustment;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    target.SortOrder = newSortOrder;Di2015NewLine    // Uncomment this if you want the list to resort every time you updateDi2015NewLine    // one of its members (not a good idea if you're doing bulk changes)Di2015NewLine    //groupInfos.Sort((info1, info2) => info1.SortOrder.CompareTo(info2.SortOrder));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11234910Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Action x = null;Di2015NewLine        x += () => Console.WriteLine("First");Di2015NewLine        x += () => { throw new Exception("Bang 1"); };Di2015NewLine        x += () => { throw new Exception("Bang 2"); };Di2015NewLine        x += () => Console.WriteLine("Second");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ExecuteAll<Action>(x, action => action());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (AggregateException e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ExecuteAll<T>(Delegate multi, Action<T> invoker)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<Exception> exceptions = new List<Exception>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var single in multi.GetInvocationList())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                invoker((T)(object)single);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                exceptions.Add(e);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (exceptions.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new AggregateException(exceptions);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11237366Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Upload()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WebRequest request = HttpWebRequest.Create("http://localhost:7267/Search/uploadFile");Di2015NewLine            request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine            //This is important, MVC uses the content-type to discover the action parametersDi2015NewLine            request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] fileBytes = System.IO.File.ReadAllBytes(@"C:\\myFile.jpg");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            StringBuilder serializedBytes = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Let's serialize the bytes of your fileDi2015NewLine            fileBytes.ToList<byte>().ForEach(x => serializedBytes.AppendFormat("{0}.", Convert.ToUInt32(x)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string postParameters = String.Format("fileName={0}&fileBytes={1}", "myFile.jpg", serializedBytes.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] postData = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(postParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (Stream postStream = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                postStream.Write(postData, 0, postData.Length);Di2015NewLine                postStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            request.BeginGetResponse(new AsyncCallback(Upload_Completed), request);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Upload_Completed(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WebRequest request = (WebRequest)(result.AsyncState);Di2015NewLine            WebResponse response = request.EndGetResponse(result);Di2015NewLine            // Parse responseDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

11240546Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<GetChild1> FilterExample()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IQueryable<GetChild1> result = _context.GetChild1;Di2015NewLine    result = from p in resultDi2015NewLine             where p.UploadDate < startDate;Di2015NewLine             select p;Di2015NewLine    //until this moment the query is still not send to the database.Di2015NewLine    result = result.OrderBy(p => p.UploadDate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //when you call the ToList method the query will be executed on the database and the list of filtered and sorted items will be returned. Notice the sorting and filtering is done in the database which is faster than doing it in memoryDi2015NewLine    List<GetChild1> populatedResult = result.ToList();Di2015NewLine    return populatedResult;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11240546Di2015UniqueSeparator //Base Class Di2015NewLineclass ReportBase<T> where T: classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private DbContext _context;Di2015NewLine    public ReportBase(DbContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _context = context;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //I think GetAll is a more suitable name for your method than load :DDi2015NewLine    public IQueryable<T> GetAll()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _context.Set<T>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IQueryable<T> Filter(Func<T,bool> filterFunction)Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine         var result = from p in GetAll()Di2015NewLine                      where filterFunction(p)Di2015NewLine                      select p;Di2015NewLine         return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11240546Di2015UniqueSeparator//Child 1Di2015NewLineclass Child1 : ReportBase<GetChild1>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public ReportBase(DbContext context):base(context)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public List<GetChild1> FilterOnStartDate(DateTime startDate)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine        //I don't know if you are familiar with lambda expressions but if you are not you can research it on the internet.Di2015NewLine        //The parameter here is converted into a method that its parameter is "p" of type GetChild1Di2015NewLine        // and the body is "p.UploadDate < startDate".Di2015NewLine        // Note you can remove the type of the parameter because the compiler can predict it.Di2015NewLine        return Filter((GetChild1 p) => p.UploadDate < startDate).ToList();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

11242178Di2015UniqueSeparator// This is a jagged array. 11243589Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static unsafe byte[,] GetWeight(Bitmap a)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BitmapData aData = a.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, a.Width, a.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, a.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine    const int pixelSize = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[,] weight = new byte[aData.Width, aData.Height];Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < aData.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte* aRow = (byte*)aData.Scan0 + (y * aData.Stride);Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < aData.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte aWeight = aRow[x * pixelSize + 3];Di2015NewLine            weight[x, y] = aWeight;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    a.UnlockBits(aData);Di2015NewLine    return weight;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static double GetSimilarity(byte[,] weightsA, byte[,] weightsB)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double sum = 0;Di2015NewLine    int height = weightsA.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine    int width = weightsA.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte aWeight = weightsA[x,y];Di2015NewLine            byte bWeight = weightsB[x, y];Di2015NewLine            sum += Math.Abs(aWeight - bWeight);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return 1 - ((sum / 255) / (width * height));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11243589Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar referenceWeigth = GetWeight(referenceImage);    Di2015NewLinevar list =Di2015NewLine        imageListDi2015NewLine            .AsParallel()Di2015NewLine            .Select(image => new {@Image = image, @Weight = GetWeight(image)})Di2015NewLine            .Where(imageAndWeight => GetSimilarity(imageAndWeight.Weight, referenceWeigth) > 0.5)Di2015NewLine            .Select(imageAndWeight => imageAndWeight.Image);Di2015NewLine

11248725Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpressionVisitor
11248725Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// An <see cref="ExpressionVisitor"/> implementation which uses <see href="http://automapper.org">AutoMapper</see> to remap property access from elements of type <typeparamref name="TSource"/> to elements of type <typeparamref name="TDestination"/>.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="TSource">The type of the source element.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="TDestination">The type of the destination element.</typeparam>Di2015NewLinepublic class AutoMapVisitor<TSource, TDestination> : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ParameterExpression _newParameter;Di2015NewLine    private readonly TypeMap _typeMap = Mapper.FindTypeMapFor<TSource, TDestination>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initialises a new instance of the <see cref="AutoMapVisitor{TSource, TDestination}"/> class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="newParameter">The new <see cref="ParameterExpression"/> to access.</param>Di2015NewLine    public AutoMapVisitor(ParameterExpression newParameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Contract.Requires(newParameter != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _newParameter = newParameter;Di2015NewLine        Contract.Assume(_typeMap != null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ContractInvariantMethod]Di2015NewLine    [SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Performance", "CA1822:MarkMembersAsStatic", Justification = "Required for code contracts.")]Di2015NewLine    private void ObjectInvariant()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Contract.Invariant(_typeMap != null);Di2015NewLine        Contract.Invariant(_newParameter != null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Visits the children of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// The modified expression, if it or any subexpression was modified; otherwise, returns the original expression.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="node">The expression to visit.</param>Di2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitMember(MemberExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var propertyMaps = _typeMap.GetPropertyMaps();Di2015NewLine        Contract.Assume(propertyMaps != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find any mapping for this memberDi2015NewLine        var propertyMap = propertyMaps.SingleOrDefault(map => map.SourceMember == node.Member);Di2015NewLine        if (propertyMap == null)Di2015NewLine            return base.VisitMember(node);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var destinationProperty = propertyMap.DestinationProperty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Contract.Assume(destinationProperty != null);Di2015NewLine        var destinationMember = destinationProperty.MemberInfo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Contract.Assume(destinationMember != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check the new member is a property tooDi2015NewLine        var property = destinationMember as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine        if (property == null)Di2015NewLine            return base.VisitMember(node);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Access the new propertyDi2015NewLine        var newPropertyAccess = Expression.Property(_newParameter, property);Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitMember(newPropertyAccess);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11248725Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// A class which contains extension methods for <see cref="Expression"/> and <see cref="Expression{TDelegate}"/> instances.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class ExpressionExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Remaps all property access from type <typeparamref name="TSource"/> to <typeparamref name="TDestination"/> in <paramref name="expression"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TSource">The type of the source element.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TDestination">The type of the destination element.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TResult">The type of the result from the lambda expression.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="expression">The <see cref="Expression{TDelegate}"/> to remap the property access in.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An <see cref="Expression{TDelegate}"/> equivalent to <paramref name="expression"/>, but applying to elements of type <typeparamref name="TDestination"/> instead of <typeparamref name="TSource"/>.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<TDestination, TResult>> RemapForType<TSource, TDestination, TResult>(this Expression<Func<TSource, TResult>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Contract.Requires(expression != null);Di2015NewLine        Contract.Ensures(Contract.Result<Expression<Func<TDestination, TResult>>>() != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var newParameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof (TDestination));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Contract.Assume(newParameter != null);Di2015NewLine        var visitor = new AutoMapVisitor<TSource, TDestination>(newParameter);Di2015NewLine        var remappedBody = visitor.Visit(expression.Body);Di2015NewLine        if (remappedBody == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Unable to remap expression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TDestination, TResult>>(remappedBody, newParameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11248725Di2015UniqueSeparator[TestFixture]Di2015NewLinepublic class RemappingTestsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region Setup/TeardownDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Sets up the variables before each test.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    [SetUp]Di2015NewLine    public void Setup()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var accountModelMap = Mapper.CreateMap<AccountModel, Account>();Di2015NewLine        Contract.Assume(accountModelMap != null);Di2015NewLine        accountModelMap.ForMember(account => account.Id, expression => expression.MapFrom(model => model.Id));Di2015NewLine        accountModelMap.ForMember(account => account.Balance, expression => expression.MapFrom(model => model.Bal));Di2015NewLine        accountModelMap.ForMember(account => account.CustomerName, expression => expression.MapFrom(model => model.Name));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [TearDown]Di2015NewLine    public void Teardown()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Mapper.Reset();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Checks that <see cref="ExpressionExtensions.RemapForType{TSource, TDestination, TResult}(Expression{Func{TSource, TResult}})"/> correctly remaps all property access for the new type.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="balance">The balance to use as the value for <see cref="Account.Balance"/>.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Whether the <see cref="Account.Balance"/> was greater than 50.</returns>Di2015NewLine    [TestCase(0, Result = false)]Di2015NewLine    [TestCase(80, Result = true)]Di2015NewLine    public bool RemapperUsesPropertiesOfNewDataType(double balance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<AccountModel, bool>> modelExpr = model => model.Bal > 50;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var accountExpr = modelExpr.RemapForType<AccountModel, Account, bool>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var compiled = accountExpr.Compile();Di2015NewLine        Contract.Assume(compiled != 11254126Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TargettedObserver<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly EqualityComparer<T> EqualityComparer = EqualityComparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Func<T> ValueTarget;Di2015NewLine    private T OldValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event ObservedValueChangedEventHandler<T> ValueChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TargettedObserver(Func<T> valueTarget)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ValueTarget = valueTarget;Di2015NewLine        OldValue = ObtainCurrentValue();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CheckValue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T oldValue = OldValue;Di2015NewLine        T newValue = ObtainCurrentValue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool hasValueChanged = CompareValues(oldValue, newValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (hasValueChanged)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OldValue = newValue;Di2015NewLine            NotifyValueChanged(oldValue, newValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return hasValueChanged;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void NotifyValueChanged(T oldValue, T newValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var valueChangedEvent = ValueChanged;Di2015NewLine        if (valueChangedEvent != null)Di2015NewLine            valueChangedEvent(this, new ObservedValueChangedEventArgs<T>(oldValue, newValue));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool CompareValues(T oldValue, T newValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !EqualityComparer.Equals(oldValue, newValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private T ObtainCurrentValue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ValueTarget();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11254126Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ObservedValueChangedEventArgs<T> : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T OldValue { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public T NewValue { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ObservedValueChangedEventArgs(T oldValue, T newValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.OldValue = oldValue;Di2015NewLine        this.NewValue = newValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic delegate void ObservedValueChangedEventHandler<T>(TargettedObserver<T> observer, ObservedValueChangedEventArgs<T> eventArgs);Di2015NewLine

pipelines)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  base.ApplicationStartup(container, pipelines);Di2015NewLine  pipelines.BeforeRequest += ctx => CreateSession(container);Di2015NewLine  pipelines.AfterRequest += 11260882Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic String Login(String userName, String password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        OleDbConnection connect = new OleDbConnection(connection);Di2015NewLine        connect.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        OleDbCommand command = new OleDbCommand("Select UID, firstName, lastName from login where userName=?  and password =?", connect);Di2015NewLine        command.CommandType = CommandType.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //to avoid sql injectionDi2015NewLine        command.Parameters.Add(userName);Di2015NewLine        command.Parameters.Add(password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        OleDbDataAdapter adapter = new OleDbDataAdapter();Di2015NewLine        adapter.SelectCommand = command;Di2015NewLine        DataSet NSNSet = new DataSet();Di2015NewLine        adapter.Fill(NSNSet);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (NSNSet.Tables[0].Rows.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine            return "Access denied";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string username = NSNSet.Tables[0].Rows[0]["firstName"].ToString() + NSNSet.Tables[0].Rows[0]["lastName"].ToString();Di2015NewLine        int userID = int.Parse(NSNSet.Tables[0].Rows[0]["UID"].ToString());Di2015NewLine        return username + "," + userID;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
11260882Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic String Login(String userName, String password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        OleDbConnection connect = new OleDbConnection(connection);Di2015NewLine        connect.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        OleDbCommand command = new OleDbCommand("Select UID, firstName, lastName from login where userName=?  and password =?", connect);Di2015NewLine        command.CommandType = CommandType.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //to avoid sql injectionDi2015NewLine        command.Parameters.Add(userName);Di2015NewLine        command.Parameters.Add(password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        OleDbDataReader reader=command.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine        if (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //that means there's at least one rowDi2015NewLine            string username = reader["firstName"] + " " + reader["lastName"];Di2015NewLine            int userID = int.Parse(reader["UID"].ToString());Di2015NewLine            return username + "," + userID;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //no combination username-password foundDi2015NewLine            return "Access denied";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11261799Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Draggable : PictureBoxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Rectangle shapeBounds;Di2015NewLine    bool isDragging;Di2015NewLine    Point dragPoint;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Draggable()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        shapeBounds = new Rectangle(10, 10, 30, 30);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnMouseDown(MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnMouseDown(e);Di2015NewLine        if (shapeBounds.Contains(e.Location))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            isDragging = true;Di2015NewLine            dragPoint = new Point(Di2015NewLine                e.Location.X - shapeBounds.Location.X,Di2015NewLine                e.Location.Y - shapeBounds.Location.Y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnMouseUp(MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnMouseUp(e);Di2015NewLine        isDragging = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnMouseMove(MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnMouseMove(e);Di2015NewLine        if (isDragging)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Point p = new Point(Di2015NewLine                e.Location.X - dragPoint.X,Di2015NewLine                e.Location.Y - dragPoint.Y);Di2015NewLine            shapeBounds = new Rectangle(p, shapeBounds.Size);Di2015NewLine            Invalidate();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnPaint(e);Di2015NewLine        e.Graphics.FillRectangle(Brushes.Red, shapeBounds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11262819Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void EncryptXmlFile(this XmlDocument doc, string elemToEncryptName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (doc == null)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var security = new CryptoKeySecurity();Di2015NewLine    // Give the creating user full accessDi2015NewLine    security.AddAccessRule(new CryptoKeyAccessRule(new NTAccount(Environment.UserDomainName, Environment.UserName), CryptoKeyRights.FullControl, AccessControlType.Allow));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add read-only access to other users as requiredDi2015NewLine    security.AddAccessRule(new CryptoKeyAccessRule(new NTAccount("<domain name>", "<user name>"), CryptoKeyRights.GenericRead, AccessControlType.Allow));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Specify that the key is to be stored in the machine key-store, and apply the security settings created aboveDi2015NewLine    var cspParams = new CspParametersDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        KeyContainerName = containerName,Di2015NewLine        Flags = CspProviderFlags.UseMachineKeyStore,Di2015NewLine        CryptoKeySecurity = securityDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    var rsaKey = new RSACryptoServiceProvider(cspParams);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Remainder of the method here...Di2015NewLine

11267133Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void PopulateColorCubeFilter(CIFilter filter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (filter.Name != "CIColorCube")Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int dimension = 64;  // Must be power of 2, max of 128 (max of 64 on ios)Di2015NewLine    int cubeDataSize = 4 * dimension * dimension * dimension;Di2015NewLine    filter[new NSString("inputCubeDimension")] = new NSNumber(dimension);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // 2 : 32 /4 = 8 = 2^3Di2015NewLine    // 4 : 256 /4 = 64 = 4^3Di2015NewLine    // 8 : 2048 /4 = 512 = 8^3Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var cubeData = new byte[cubeDataSize];Di2015NewLine    var rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    rnd.NextBytes(cubeData);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 3; i < cubeDataSize; i += 4)Di2015NewLine        cubeData[i] = 255;Di2015NewLine    filter[new NSString("inputCubeData")] = NSData.FromArray(cubeData);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11271807Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] inputs =Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    "Hello the items you are looking for are Item #25, 38, 22, and 45. They total 100 dollars.",Di2015NewLine    "... Item #25, 38 and 45. Other numbers 100, 20, and 30 untouched.",Di2015NewLine    "Item #25, and 45",Di2015NewLine    "Item #25 and 45",Di2015NewLine    "Item #25"Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring pattern = @"\\bItem #\\d+(?:,? \\d+)*(?:,? and \\d+)?";Di2015NewLinestring digitPattern = @"(\\d+)";Di2015NewLine// $1 refers to the first (and only) group in digitPatternDi2015NewLinestring replacement = @"<a href=""http://url/$1.html"">$1</a>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var input in inputs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Match m = Regex.Match(input, pattern);Di2015NewLine    string formatted = Regex.Replace(m.Value, digitPattern, replacement);Di2015NewLine    var builder = new StringBuilder(input)Di2015NewLine                        .Remove(m.Index, m.Length)Di2015NewLine                        .Insert(m.Index, formatted);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(builder.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11273279Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] StreamToByteArray(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinebyte[] total_stream = new byte[0];Di2015NewLineusing (Stream input = File.Open(fileName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] stream_array = new byte[0];Di2015NewLine    // Setup whatever read size you want (small here for testing)Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[32];// * 1024];Di2015NewLine    int read = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while ((read = input.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        stream_array = new byte[total_stream.Length + read];Di2015NewLine        total_stream.CopyTo(stream_array, 0);Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(buffer, 0, stream_array, total_stream.Length, read);Di2015NewLine        total_stream = stream_array;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinereturn total_stream;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11274726Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CappedQueue<T> : IEnumerable<T> {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly m_Capacity;Di2015NewLine    private Queue<T> m_InnerQueue;Di2015NewLine    public CappedQueue<T>(int capacity) {Di2015NewLine        m_Capacity = capacity;Di2015NewLine        m_InnerQueue = new Queue<T>(capacity);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Wrap required methods Di2015NewLine    public void Enqueue(T item){Di2015NewLine        if(m_InnerQueue.Count()) == capacity) {Di2015NewLine            m_InnerQueue.Dequeue() ;                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        m_InnerQueue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return m_InnerQueue.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Test {Di2015NewLine    public void Foo()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var queue = new CappedQueue<DateTime>(5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(DateTime.Now); // each time the user press the keyDi2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(DateTime.Now); // each time the user press the keyDi2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(DateTime.Now); // each time the user press the keyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TimeSpan diff = (queue.Last() / queue.Fisrt())/queue.Count();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Foo2()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var queue = new CappedQueue<int>(5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(10);Di2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(20);Di2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(30);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var average = queue.Average(x=>x);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void SecureTextBox_Enter(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            log.Info("entering=" + field.Variable );Di2015NewLine (isInManualMode)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.ReadOnly = false;Di2015NewLine                base.Text = RealText;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else temp;Di2015NewLine                Invalidate();Di2015NewLine                log.Info("txt=" + base.Text + " temp=" + temp);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else //not manual mode and   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void MaskData()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            log.Debug("mask=" + this.field.NumBeginDigitsToMaskSpecified + " num=" + field.NumBeginDigitsToMask + " txtLen=" + RealText.Length);Di2015NewLine            int numDigitsToMask = RealText.Length;Di2015NewLine            if (this.field.NumBeginDigitsToMaskSpecified && this.field.NumBeginDigitsToMask < RealText.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int numDigits = this.field.NumBeginDigitsToMask;Di2015NewLine                string maskedPart "".PadLeft(RealText.Length, 'â—?');Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ChangeBackground()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if 11276940Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TSource> WhereWithLookahead<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource, TSource, bool> predicate) where TSource : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using(var enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //emptyDi2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine        while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var next = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(predicate(current, next))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            current = next;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (predicate(current, null))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Use:Di2015NewLinevar query2 = list.WhereWithLookahead((current, next) =>Di2015NewLine    !current.Kind.HasValue &&Di2015NewLine    (next != null) &&Di2015NewLine    next.Kind.HasValue);Di2015NewLine

11278412Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Dictionary<string,long> numberTable=Di2015NewLine    new Dictionary<string,long>Di2015NewLine        {{"zero",0},{"one",1},{"two",2},{"three",3},{"four",4},Di2015NewLine        {"five",5},{"six",6},{"seven",7},{"eight",8},{"nine",9},Di2015NewLine        {"ten",10},{"eleven",11},{"twelve",12},{"thirteen",13},Di2015NewLine        {"fourteen",14},{"fifteen",15},{"sixteen",16},Di2015NewLine        {"seventeen",17},{"eighteen",18},{"nineteen",19},{"twenty",20},Di2015NewLine        {"thirty",30},{"forty",40},{"fifty",50},{"sixty",60},Di2015NewLine        {"seventy",70},{"eighty",80},{"ninety",90},{"hundred",100},Di2015NewLine        {"thousand",1000},{"million",1000000},{"billion",1000000000},Di2015NewLine        {"trillion",1000000000000},{"quadrillion",1000000000000000},Di2015NewLine        {"quintillion",1000000000000000000}};Di2015NewLinepublic static long ToLong(string numberString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var numbers = Regex.Matches(numberString, @"\\w+").Cast<Match>()Di2015NewLine         .Select(m => m.Value.ToLowerInvariant())Di2015NewLine         .Where(v => numberTable.ContainsKey(v))Di2015NewLine         .Select(v => numberTable[v]);Di2015NewLine    long acc = 0,total = 0L;Di2015NewLine    foreach(var n in numbers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(n >= 1000)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += (acc * n);Di2015NewLine            acc = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if(n >= 100){Di2015NewLine            acc *= n;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else acc += n;          Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (total + acc)  * ( numberString.StartsWith("minus",Di2015NewLine          StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase) ? -1 : 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11286115Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var input = new[] { "abc", "bcd", "xyz", "zzz", };Di2015NewLine    var except = new[] { "abc", "xyz", };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ExceptSortedInputs(input, except).Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define other methods and classes hereDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<string> ExceptSortedInputs(IEnumerable<string> inputSequence, IEnumerable<string> exceptSequence)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Contract.Requires<ArgumentNullException>(inputSequence != null);Di2015NewLine    Contract.Requires<ArgumentNullException>(exceptSequence != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var exceptEnumerator = exceptSequence.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    Contract.Assert(exceptEnumerator.MoveNext(), "except sequence was empty, silly");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var inputEnumerator = inputSequence.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    while (inputEnumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // need to move the except sequence forward to ensure it's at or later than the current input wordDi2015NewLine        while (String.Compare(inputEnumerator.Current, exceptEnumerator.Current) == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (exceptEnumerator.MoveNext() == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // stupid optimization - since there are no more except matches, we can just return the rest of the inputDi2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return inputEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while (inputEnumerator.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                yield break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // when we get here, we know the current 'except' word is equal to or later than the input one, so we can just check equalityDi2015NewLine        if (inputEnumerator.Current != exceptEnumerator.Current)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return inputEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11286115Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var input = new[] { "abc", "bcd", "xyz", "zzz", };Di2015NewLine    var except = new[] { "abc", "xyz", };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ExceptSortedInputs(input, except).Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define other methods and classes hereDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<string> ExceptSortedInputs(IEnumerable<string> inputSequence, IEnumerable<string> exceptSequence)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var exceptEnumerator = exceptSequence.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    var exceptStillHasElements = exceptEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var inputEnumerator = inputSequence.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    var inputStillHasElements = inputEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (inputStillHasElements)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (exceptStillHasElements == false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // since we exhausted the except sequence, we know we can safely return any input elementsDi2015NewLine            yield return inputEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine            inputStillHasElements = inputEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // need to compare to see which operation to performDi2015NewLine        switch (String.Compare(inputEnumerator.Current, exceptEnumerator.Current))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case -1:Di2015NewLine                // except sequence is already later, so we can safely return thisDi2015NewLine                yield return inputEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                inputStillHasElements = inputEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case 0:Di2015NewLine                // except sequence has a match, so we can safely skip thisDi2015NewLine                inputStillHasElements = inputEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case 1:Di2015NewLine                // except sequence is behind - we need to move it forwardDi2015NewLine                exceptStillHasElements = exceptEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11294227Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void ReplaceInvalidCharFromAttribute(string filePath, string startElement, string nextElement, string[] removeStrings)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string tempFile = Path.GetTempFileName();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var sr = new StreamReader(filePath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (var sw = new StreamWriter(tempFile))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string line;Di2015NewLine                    string temp;Di2015NewLine                    while ((line = sr.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        temp = RemoveInvalidCharFromAttribute(line, startElement, nextElement, removeStrings);Di2015NewLine                        sw.WriteLine(temp??line);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            File.Delete(filePath);Di2015NewLine            File.Move(tempFile, filePath);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string RemoveInvalidCharFromAttribute(string input, string startElement, string nextElement, string[] invalidChars)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (input.IndexOf(startElement) < 0 || input.IndexOf(nextElement) < 0) return null;Di2015NewLine            int start =input.IndexOf(startElement) + startElement.Length;Di2015NewLine            int end = input.IndexOf(nextElement);Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder res = new StringBuilder(input.Substring(start, (end - start)));Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder resCopy = new StringBuilder(res.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (string inv in invalidChars)Di2015NewLine                res.Replace(inv, "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // return the result after surrounding the text with double Di2015NewLine            returnDi2015NewLine                input.Replace(Di2015NewLine                resCopy.ToString(),Di2015NewLine                (String.Concat("\\"", String.Concat(res.ToString().Trim(), "\\" "))));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

11294528Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool AccountGetFullName(string MachineName, string AccountName, ref string FullName) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (MachineName.Length == 0 ) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Machine Name is required");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (AccountName.Length == 0 ) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Account Name is required");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    try Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create an new instance of the USER_INFO_1 structDi2015NewLine        USER_INFO_10 objUserInfo10 = new USER_INFO_10();Di2015NewLine        IntPtr bufPtr; // because it's an OUT, we don't need to AllocDi2015NewLine        int lngReturn = NetUserGetInfo(MachineName, AccountName, 10, out bufPtr ) ;Di2015NewLine        if (lngReturn == 0) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            objUserInfo10 = (USER_INFO_10) Marshal.PtrToStructure(bufPtr, typeof(USER_INFO_10) );Di2015NewLine            FullName = objUserInfo10.usri10_full_name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        NetApiBufferFree( bufPtr );Di2015NewLine        bufPtr = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        if (lngReturn == 0 ) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //throw new System.ApplicationException("Could not get user's Full Name.");Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception exp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.WriteLine("AccountGetFullName: " + exp.Message);Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11294541Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Calculate integral with trapezoidal ruleDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="h">The step size in x-axis</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="y">The array of values to integrate</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The area under the curve y[i,0]</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static double Integrate(double h, double[,] y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int N=y.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double sum=(y[0, 0]+y[N-1, 0])/2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int i=1; i<N-1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sum+=y[i, 0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return h*sum;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int N = 100;Di2015NewLine        double[,] y=new double[N, 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int i=0; i<y.GetLength(0); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            y[i, 0]=5+5*Math.Sin(2*Math.PI*i/(N-1));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double x_min=0.5;Di2015NewLine        double x_max=3.5;Di2015NewLine        double h = (x_max-x_min)/N;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double area=Integrate(h, y);Di2015NewLine        // expected answer is   area = 15.00Di2015NewLine        // actual answer is     area = 14.85Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11295783Di2015UniqueSeparator-(NSDate*)mfDateFromDotNetJSONString:(NSString *)stringDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static NSRegularExpression *dateRegEx = nil;Di2015NewLine    static dispatch_once_t onceToken;Di2015NewLine    dispatch_once(&onceToken, ^{Di2015NewLine        dateRegEx = [[NSRegularExpression alloc] initWithPattern:@"^\\\\/date\\\\((-?\\\\d++)(?:([+-])(\\\\d{2})(\\\\d{2}))?\\\\)\\\\/$" options:NSRegularExpressionCaseInsensitive error:nil];Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    NSTextCheckingResult *regexResult = [dateRegEx firstMatchInString:string options:0 range:NSMakeRange(0, [string length])];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (regexResult)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // millisecondsDi2015NewLine        NSTimeInterval seconds = [[string substringWithRange:[regexResult rangeAtIndex:1]] doubleValue] / 1000.0;Di2015NewLine        // timezone offsetDi2015NewLine        if ([regexResult rangeAtIndex:2].location != NSNotFound) {Di2015NewLine            NSString *sign = [string substringWithRange:[regexResult rangeAtIndex:2]];Di2015NewLine            // hoursDi2015NewLine            seconds += [[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@%@", sign, [string substringWithRange:[regexResult rangeAtIndex:3]]] doubleValue] * 60.0 * 60.0;Di2015NewLine            // minutesDi2015NewLine            seconds += [[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@%@", sign, [string substringWithRange:[regexResult rangeAtIndex:4]]] doubleValue] * 60.0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return [NSDate dateWithTimeIntervalSince1970:seconds];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return nil;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11296402Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Reverse(Array arr, int index, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Array.Reverse(arr, index, count);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic void Reverse<T>(List<T> lst, int index, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lst.Reverse(index, count);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11296402Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Reverse(this IList target, int index, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int right = index + count - 1;Di2015NewLine        int left = index;Di2015NewLine        while (right>left)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tmp = target[left];Di2015NewLine            target[left] = target[right];Di2015NewLine            target[right] = tmp;Di2015NewLine            right--;Di2015NewLine            left++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11299417Di2015UniqueSeparator// store this class in a file in your app_code folder called something like MyClass.csDi2015NewLinepublic class MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public string SomeStringValue;Di2015NewLine   public int SomeIntValue;Di2015NewLine   public List<SomeOtherClass> MyClassCollection = new List<SomeOtherClass>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SomeOtherClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string OtherStringValue;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// At the beginning of your form, on your first page, instance this classDi2015NewLineMyClass oMyClass = new MyClass();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then, when you collect the data on the page, set the values in the classDi2015NewLineoMyClass.SomeStringValue = "derp";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then, store it on session in that pageDi2015NewLineSession["oMyClass"] = oMyClass;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then, on the next page, get the object from sessionDi2015NewLineMyClass oMyClass = (MyClass)Session["oMyclass"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then, set the next value in your objectDi2015NewLineoMyClass.SomeIntValue = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then, place it back in session on that page, and then keep chuggin through your workflow.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now, I didn't show you how to use MyClassCollection that is in the MyClass object, but it would be simple for you to store a class from each page in that collection like soDi2015NewLineSomeOtherClass oSomeOtherClass = new SomeOtherClass();Di2015NewLineoSomeOtherClass.OtherStringValue = "herp";Di2015NewLineoMyclass.MyClassCollection.Add(oSomeOtherClass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then you can place that collection in sessionDi2015NewLine

11307466Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ChildForm_FormClosing(object sender, FormClosingEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object someArgsInterestingForTheMethod = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    e.Cancel = !((IManagedForm)this).CanIBeClosed(someArgsInterestingForTheMethod);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool CanIBeClosed(object someParams)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This flag would control if this window has not pending changes.Di2015NewLine    bool meetConditions = ValidateClosingConditions(someParams);Di2015NewLine    // If there were pending changes, but the user decided to not discardDi2015NewLine    // them an proceed saving, this flag says to the parent that this formDi2015NewLine    // is done, therefore is ready to be closed.Di2015NewLine    bool iAmReadyToBeClosed = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // There are unsaved changed. "somesalt";Di2015NewLine        int PasswordIterations = 0; //amend to match java encryption iterationDi2015NewLine        string InitVector = "someiv";Di2015NewLine        int KeySize = 0; //amend to match java encryption key sizeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] initVectorBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(InitVector);Di2015NewLine        byte[] saltValueBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(SaltValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] plainTextBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(plainText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Rfc2898DeriveBytes password = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(Di2015NewLine                                                        PassPhrase,Di2015NewLine                                                        saltValueBytes,Di2015NewLine                                                        PasswordIterations);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] keyBytes = password.GetBytes(KeySize / 8);Di2015NewLine        RijndaelManaged symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine        symmetricKey.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ICryptoTransform encryptor = symmetricKey.CreateEncryptor(Di2015NewLine                                                         keyBytes,Di2015NewLine                                                         initVectorBytes);Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream,Di2015NewLine                                                     encryptor,Di2015NewLine                                                     CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cryptoStream.Write(plainTextBytes, 0, plainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine        byte[] cipherTextBytes = memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string cipherText = Convert.ToBase64String(cipherTextBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return cipherText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11315054Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic T RandomChoice<T> (IEnumerable<T> source) {Di2015NewLine  Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine  T result = default(T);Di2015NewLine  int cnt = 0;Di2015NewLine  foreach (T item in source) {Di2015NewLine    cnt++;Di2015NewLine    if (rnd.Next(cnt) == 0) {Di2015NewLine      result = item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11315100Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport javax.crypto.*Di2015NewLineimport javax.crypto.spec.*Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef key1 = new SecretKeySpec("C67DDB0CE47D27FA".decodeHex(), "DES")Di2015NewLinedef key2 = new SecretKeySpec("F6F32ECA5C99E8AF".decodeHex(), "DES")Di2015NewLinedef plaintext = ("ff00" + "000000000000").decodeHex() // manually zero padDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef c1 = Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/NoPadding")Di2015NewLinec1.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key1, new IvParameterSpec(new byte[8]))Di2015NewLinedef cipherText1 = c1.doFinal(plaintext) Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef c2 = Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/NoPadding")Di2015NewLinec2.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, key2, new IvParameterSpec(new byte[8]))Di2015NewLinedef cipherText2 = c2.doFinal(cipherText1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef c3 = Cipher.getInstance("DES/ECB/NoPadding")Di2015NewLinec3.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key1)Di2015NewLinedef cipherText3 = c3.doFinal(cipherText2)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineassert cipherText3.encodeHex().toString() == "4bc0479d7889cf8e"Di2015NewLine

11318178Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var solver = SolverContext.GetContext();Di2015NewLine    var model = solver.CreateModel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var A = new[,]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            { 1, 0, 0, 0, 0 }, Di2015NewLine            { 0.760652602, 1, 0, 0, 0 }, Di2015NewLine            { 0.373419404, 0.760537565, 1, 0, 0 },Di2015NewLine            { 0.136996731, 0.373331934, 0.760422587, 1, 0 },Di2015NewLine            { 0.040625222, 0.136953801, 0.373244464, 0.76030755, 1 }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    var b = new[] { 2017159, 1609660, 837732.8125, 330977.3125, 87528.38281 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var n = A.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine    var x = new Decision[n];Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < n; ++i)Di2015NewLine        model.AddDecision(x[i] = new Decision(Domain.RealNonnegative, null));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // START NLP SECTIONDi2015NewLine    var m = A.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine    Term goal = 0.0;Di2015NewLine    for (var j = 0; j < m; ++j)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Term Ax = 0.0;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < n; ++i) Ax += A[j, i] * x[i];Di2015NewLine        goal += Model.Power(Ax - b[j], 2.0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    model.AddGoal(null, GoalKind.Minimize, goal);Di2015NewLine    // END NLP SECTIONDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var solution = solver.Solve();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("f = {0}", solution.Goals.First().ToDouble());Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < n; ++i) Console.WriteLine("x[{0}] = {1}", i, x[i].GetDouble());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void button1_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (bw.IsBusy != true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bw.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void bw_ProgressChanged(object sender, ProgressChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            textbox1.Text = (e.ProgressPercentage.ToString() + " %");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void bw_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BackgroundWorker worker = sender as BackgroundWorker;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string scriptText = @"Di2015NewLine                function startExport() {Di2015NewLine                    $script:finishtime = (get-date).addminutes(1)Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                function getPercentDone() {Di2015NewLine                    $timeleft = new-timespan $(get-date) $finishtimeDi2015NewLine                    return [math]::truncate(100 - ($timeleft.totalseconds / 60) * 100)Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                startExport";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PowerShell psExec = PowerShell.Create();Di2015NewLine commandsDi2015NewLine            psExec.Commands.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Collection<PSObject> results;Di2015NewLine            Collection<ErrorRecord> errors;Di2015NewLine            int percent = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Report on the exportDi2015NewLine            while (percent < 100)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Update every secondDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                psExec.AddScript("getPercentDone | out-string");Di2015NewLine                results = {Di2015NewLine                    Int32.TryParse(obj.ToString(), out percent);Di2015NewLine                    worker.ReportProgress(percent);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void bw_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((e.Cancelled == true))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                textbox1.Text = "Canceled!";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (!(e.Error == null))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                textbox1.Text = ("Error: " + e.Error.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                textbox1.Text 11323423Di2015UniqueSeparator //method for finding first element of the listbox data templateDi2015NewLine    private T FindFirstElementInVisualTree<T>(DependencyObject parentElement) where T : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var count = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(parentElement);Di2015NewLine        if (count == 0)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(parentElement, i);Di2015NewLine            if (child != null && child is T)Di2015NewLine            { return (T)child; }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var result = FindFirstElementInVisualTree<T>(child);Di2015NewLine                if (result != null)Di2015NewLine                    return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11328373Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<TObject, TProp> Converter<TObject, TProp>(Expression<Func<TProp>> propertyExpression )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression member = propertyExpression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the Property information of the propertyExpression memberExpressionDi2015NewLine        var property = member.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the Declaring type information from member expression (equivalent to TObject)Di2015NewLine        var type = member.Member.DeclaringType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Define the source Parameter for the new Func delegateDi2015NewLine        var param = Expression.Parameter(type, "source");Di2015NewLine        var source = Expression.Convert(param, type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the property on the sourceDi2015NewLine        var get = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(source, property);Di2015NewLine        var convert = Expression.Convert(get, typeof(TProp));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Construct the ExpressionDi2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<TObject, TProp>>(convert, param);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Compile to get the Func delegate typeDi2015NewLine        return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11330342Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class Extensions {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static IEnumerable<Tuple<T, Int32>> ToRunLengths<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source) {Di2015NewLine    using (var enumerator = source.GetEnumerator()) {Di2015NewLine      // Empty input leads to empty output.Di2015NewLine      if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Retrieve first item of the sequence.Di2015NewLine      var currentValue = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine      var runLength = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Iterate the remaining items in the sequence.Di2015NewLine      while (enumerator.MoveNext()) {Di2015NewLine        var value = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine        if (!Equals(value, currentValue)) {Di2015NewLine          // A new run is starting. Return the previous run.Di2015NewLine          yield return Tuple.Create(currentValue, runLength);Di2015NewLine          currentValue = value;Di2015NewLine          runLength = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        runLength += 1;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Return the last run.Di2015NewLine      yield return Tuple.Create(currentValue, runLength);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11333344Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface ISomethingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SomethingA : ISomethingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SomethingB : ISomethingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Foo(ISomething something)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(something);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BarDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Bar(ISomething something)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(something);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11333344Di2015UniqueSeparator// We create the kernel that will be used to provide instances when requiredDi2015NewLinevar kernel = new StandardKernel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Declare 2 named implementations of the same interfaceDi2015NewLinekernel.Bind<ISomething>().To<SomethingA>().Named("somethingA");Di2015NewLinekernel.Bind<ISomething>().To<SomethingB>().Named("somethingB");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// inject SomethingA into Foo's constructorDi2015NewLinekernel.Bind<Foo>().ToSelf().WithConstructorArgument(Di2015NewLine    "something", ctx => ctx.Kernel.Get<ISomething>("somethingA")Di2015NewLine);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// inject SomethingB into Bar's constructorDi2015NewLinekernel.Bind<Bar>().ToSelf().WithConstructorArgument(Di2015NewLine    "something", ctx => ctx.Kernel.Get<ISomething>("somethingB")Di2015NewLine);Di2015NewLine

11335953Di2015UniqueSeparatorpd_PrintPage
11335953Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid pd_PrintPage(object sender, PrintPageEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int currentamt = (amtleft > 40)?40:amtleft;Di2015NewLine    Graphics g = e.Graphics;Di2015NewLine    var font = new Font("Arial", 10f, FontStyle.Regular);Di2015NewLine    for(int x = counter; x < (currentamt+counter); x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        g.DrawString(_stringToPrint[x], font, Brushes.Black, new PointF(10f, (float)x*10));Di2015NewLine        // x*10 is just so the lines are printed downwards and not on top of each otherDi2015NewLine        // For example Line 2 would be printed below Line 1 etcDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    counter+=currentamt;Di2015NewLine    amtleft-=currentamt;Di2015NewLine    if(amtleft<0)Di2015NewLine        e.HasMorePages = true;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        e.HasMorePages = false;Di2015NewLine    // If e.HasMorePages is set to true and the 'PrintPage' has finished, it will print another page, else it wontDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11337099Di2015UniqueSeparator    public string CallCardDetails(string CallCardNo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //initializeDi2015NewLine        using (DataSet ds = new DataSet())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //connectDi2015NewLine            using (OracleConnection conn = new OracleConnection("User Id=oraDB;Password=ora;Data Source=CCT"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Oracle uses : for parameters, not @Di2015NewLine                string query = "SELECT idcard from CallCardTable where idcard= :pCallCardNo";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Let the using block dispose of your OracleCommandDi2015NewLine                using (OracleCommand cmd = new OracleCommand(query, conn))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Note: be careful with AddWithValue: if there's a mismatch between the .NET datatype ofDi2015NewLine                    // CallCardNo and the idcard column you could have an issue.  Cast the value you provideDi2015NewLine                    // here to whatever is closest to your database type (String for VARCHAR2, DateTime for DATE, Decimal for NUMBER, etc.)Di2015NewLine                    cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue(":pCallCardNo", CallCardNo);Di2015NewLine                    conn.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Again, wrap disposables in a using or use try/catch/finally (using will dispose of things in case of exceptions too)Di2015NewLine                    using (OracleDataAdapter dA = new OracleDataAdapter(cmd))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        dA.Fill(ds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        return ds.GetXml();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11337472Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class QueryableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<T> OrderBy<T>(this IQueryable<T> source, string sortProperty, ListSortDirection sortOrder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        var property = type.GetProperty(sortProperty);Di2015NewLine        var parameter = Expression.Parameter(type, "p");Di2015NewLine        var propertyAccess = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(parameter, property);Di2015NewLine        var orderByExp = Expression.Lambda(propertyAccess, parameter);Di2015NewLine        var typeArguments = new Type[] { type, property.PropertyType };Di2015NewLine        var methodName = sortOrder == ListSortDirection.Ascending ? "OrderBy" : "OrderByDescending";Di2015NewLine        var resultExp = Expression.Call(typeof(Queryable), methodName, typeArguments, source.Expression, Expression.Quote(orderByExp));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return source.Provider.CreateQuery<T>(resultExp);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11338637Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TimedGroup {Di2015NewLine    TimedThing[] things;Di2015NewLine    System.Timers.Timer timer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TimedGroup() {Di2015NewLine        this.timer = new System.Timers.Timer();Di2015NewLine        this.timer.AutoReset = false;Di2015NewLine        this.timer.Elapsed += TimerFired;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine            ...Di2015NewLine    // some methods for adding and removing TimerThingsDi2015NewLine            ...Di2015NewLine    public void Start() {Di2015NewLine        this.timer.Interval = 1; // just to get things startedDi2015NewLine        this.timer.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Stop() {Di2015NewLine        this.timer.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void TimerFired(object sender, System.Timers.ElapsedEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        DateTime now = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        // let's have timer fire at least as frequently as every 5 minutesDi2015NewLine        // if we need to have it fire sooner than that, it will get set belowDi2015NewLine        DateTime next = now.AddMinutes(5); Di2015NewLine        foreach(var thing in this.things) {Di2015NewLine            if (thing.nextFiring <= now) {Di2015NewLine                var task = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => DoWork(thing));Di2015NewLine                thing.NextFiring = thing.NextFiring.AddSeconds(thing.IntervalSeconds);Di2015NewLine                // or maybe this is more appropriateDi2015NewLine                // thing.NextFiring = Now.AddSeconds(thing.IntervalSecs);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (thing.NextFiring < next) next = thing.NextFiring;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // set the timer to fire whenever the next soonest work needs to be doneDi2015NewLine        this.Timer.Interval = (next - now).TotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine        this.Timer.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void DoWork(TimedThing thing) {Di2015NewLine        thing.Work();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11345850Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<Point> GetSubPositions(Bitmap main, Bitmap sub) {Di2015NewLine    List<Point> possiblepos = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int mainwidth = main.Width;Di2015NewLine    int mainheight = main.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int subwidth = sub.Width;Di2015NewLine    int subheight = sub.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int movewidth = mainwidth - subwidth;Di2015NewLine    int moveheight = mainheight - subheight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BitmapData bmMainData = main.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, mainwidth, mainheight), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine    BitmapData bmSubData = sub.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, subwidth, subheight), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int bytesMain = Math.Abs(bmMainData.Stride) * mainheight;Di2015NewLine    int strideMain = bmMainData.Stride;Di2015NewLine    System.IntPtr Scan0Main = bmMainData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine    byte[] dataMain = new byte[bytesMain];Di2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(Scan0Main, dataMain, 0, bytesMain);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int bytesSub = Math.Abs(bmSubData.Stride) * subheight;Di2015NewLine    int strideSub = bmSubData.Stride;Di2015NewLine    System.IntPtr Scan0Sub = bmSubData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine    byte[] dataSub = new byte[bytesSub];Di2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(Scan0Sub, dataSub, 0, bytesSub);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < moveheight; ++y) {Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < movewidth; ++x) {Di2015NewLine            MyColor curcolor = GetColor(x, y, strideMain, dataMain);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var item in possiblepos.ToArray()) {Di2015NewLine                int xsub = x - item.X;Di2015NewLine                int ysub = y - item.Y;Di2015NewLine                if (xsub >= subwidth || ysub >= subheight || xsub < 0)Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                MyColor subcolor = GetColor(xsub, ysub, strideSub, dataSub);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!curcolor.Equals(subcolor)) {Di2015NewLine                    possiblepos.Remove(item);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (curcolor.Equals(GetColor(0, 0, strideSub, dataSub)))Di2015NewLine                possiblepos.Add(new Point(x, y));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(dataSub, 0, Scan0Sub, bytesSub);Di2015NewLine    sub.UnlockBits(bmSubData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(dataMain, 0, Scan0Main, bytesMain);Di2015NewLine    main.UnlockBits(bmMainData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return possiblepos;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static MyColor GetColor(Point point, int stride, byte[] data) {Di2015NewLine    return GetColor(point.X, point.Y, stride, data);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static MyColor GetColor(int x, int y, int stride, byte[] data) {Di2015NewLine    int pos = y * stride + x * 4;Di2015NewLine    byte a = data[pos + 3];Di2015NewLine    byte r = data[pos + 2];Di2015NewLine    byte g = data[pos + 1];Di2015NewLine    byte b = data[pos + 0];Di2015NewLine    return MyColor.FromARGB(a, r, g, b);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestruct MyColor {Di2015NewLine    byte A;Di2015NewLine    byte R;Di2015NewLine    byte G;Di2015NewLine    byte B;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MyColor FromARGB(byte a, byte r, byte g, byte b) {Di2015NewLine        MyColor mc = new MyColor();Di2015NewLine        mc.A = a;Di2015NewLine        mc.R = r;Di2015NewLine        mc.G = g;Di2015NewLine        mc.B = b;Di2015NewLine        return mc;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj) {Di2015NewLine        if (!(obj is MyColor))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        MyColor color = (MyColor)obj;Di2015NewLine        if(color.A == this.A && color.R == this.R && color.G == this.G && color.B == this.B)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
