11348656Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Shared Function ExtractImages(ByVal pdf As Byte()) As List(Of Byte())Di2015NewLine    Dim images As New List(Of Byte())Di2015NewLine    Dim reader As New PdfReader(pdf)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    If (reader IsNot Nothing) ThenDi2015NewLine        ' Loop through all of the references in the PDF.Di2015NewLine        For refIndex = 0 To (reader.XrefSize - 1)Di2015NewLine            ' Get the object.Di2015NewLine            Dim obj = reader.GetPdfObject(refIndex)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ' Make sure we have something and that it is a stream.Di2015NewLine            If (obj IsNot Nothing) AndAlso obj.IsStream() ThenDi2015NewLine                ' Cast it to a dictionary object.Di2015NewLine                Dim pdfDict = DirectCast(obj, iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfDictionary)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ' See if it has a subtype property that is set to /IMAGE.Di2015NewLine                If pdfDict.Contains(iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfName.SUBTYPE) AndAlso (pdfDict.Get(iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfName.SUBTYPE).ToString() = iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfName.IMAGE.ToString()) ThenDi2015NewLine                    ' Grab various properties of the image.Di2015NewLine                    Dim filter = pdfDict.Get(iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfName.FILTER).ToString()Di2015NewLine                    Dim width = pdfDict.Get(iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfName.WIDTH).ToString()Di2015NewLine                    Dim height = pdfDict.Get(iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfName.HEIGHT).ToString()Di2015NewLine                    Dim bpp = pdfDict.Get(iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfName.BITSPERCOMPONENT).ToString()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    ' Grab the raw bytes of the imageDi2015NewLine                    Dim bytes = PdfReader.GetStreamBytesRaw(DirectCast(obj, PRStream))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    ' Images can be encoded in various ways. Di2015NewLine                    ' All of our images are encoded with a single filter.Di2015NewLine                    ' If there is a need to decode another filter, it will need to be added.Di2015NewLine                    If (filter = iTextSharp.text.pdf.PdfName.CCITTFAXDECODE.ToString()) ThenDi2015NewLine                        Using ms = New MemoryStream()Di2015NewLine                            Using tiff As Tiff = tiff.ClientOpen("memory", "w", ms, New TiffStream())Di2015NewLine                                tiff.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH, width)Di2015NewLine                                tiff.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH, height)Di2015NewLine                                tiff.SetField(TiffTag.COMPRESSION, Compression.CCITTFAX4)Di2015NewLine                                tiff.SetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE, bpp)Di2015NewLine                                tiff.SetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL, 1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                tiff.WriteRawStrip(0, bytes, bytes.Length)Di2015NewLine                                tiff.Flush()Di2015NewLine                                images.Add(ms.ToArray())Di2015NewLine                                tiff.Close()Di2015NewLine                            End UsingDi2015NewLine                        End UsingDi2015NewLine                    ElseDi2015NewLine                        Throw New NotImplementedException("Decoding this filter has not been implemented")Di2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Return imagesDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

11352117Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ExpressionToString<T>(Expression<Func<T>> e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var un = e.Body as BinaryExpression;Di2015NewLine    if (un != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var left = un.Left.ToString();Di2015NewLine        var leftEnd = left.Split('.').LastOrDefault();Di2015NewLine        var right = un.Right.ToString();Di2015NewLine        var rightEnd = right.Split('.').LastOrDefault();Di2015NewLine        return e.Body.ToString().Replace(left, leftEnd).Replace(right, rightEnd);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return e.Body.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(ExpressionToString(() => iTwo * iTwo));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//prints (iTwo * iTwo)Di2015NewLine

11360861Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static decimal shared ;Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Random random = new Random(12345);Di2015NewLine        decimal[] values = new decimal[20];Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Values:");Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            values[i] = (decimal)random.NextDouble();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(values[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        object allAtOnce = new object();Di2015NewLine        int waiting = 10;Di2015NewLine        shared = values[0];Di2015NewLine        int correct = 0, fail = 0;Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0 ; i < 10 ; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread thread = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock(allAtOnce)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (Interlocked.Decrement(ref waiting) == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Monitor.PulseAll(allAtOnce);Di2015NewLine                    } elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Monitor.Wait(allAtOnce);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                for(int j = 0 ; j < 1000 ; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for(int k = 0 ; k < values.Length ; k++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Thread.MemoryBarrier();Di2015NewLine                        var tmp = shared;Di2015NewLine                        if(Array.IndexOf(values, tmp) < 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("Invalid value detected: " + tmp);Di2015NewLine                            Interlocked.Increment(ref fail);Di2015NewLine                        } elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Interlocked.Increment(ref correct);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        shared = values[k];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (Interlocked.Increment(ref waiting) == 10)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("{0} correct, {1} fails",Di2015NewLine                        Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref correct, 0, 0),Di2015NewLine                        Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref fail, 0, 0));Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("All done; press any key");Di2015NewLine                    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine            thread.IsBackground = false;Di2015NewLine            thread.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public GlobalHookTrapper(GlobalHookTypes Type, bool OnThread)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.HookType = Type;Di2015NewLine            this.HookId 11362920Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass XmlCleanerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Clean(Stream sourceStream, Stream targetStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const char openingIndicator = '<';Di2015NewLine            const char closingIndicator = '>';Di2015NewLine            const int bufferSize = 1024;Di2015NewLine            long length = sourceStream.Length;Di2015NewLine            char[] buffer = new char[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine            bool startTagFound = false;Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder writeBuffer = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using(var reader = new StreamReader(sourceStream))            Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var writer = new StreamWriter(targetStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    while (reader.Read(buffer, 0, bufferSize) > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        foreach (var c in buffer)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (c == openingIndicator)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (startTagFound)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    // we have 2 following opening tags without a closing one                                Di2015NewLine                                    // just replace the first oneDi2015NewLine                                    writeBuffer = writeBuffer.Replace("<", "<");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                    // append the new oneDi2015NewLine                                    writeBuffer.Append(c);Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                elseDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    startTagFound = true;Di2015NewLine                                    writeBuffer.Append(c);Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            else if (c == closingIndicator)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                startTagFound = false;Di2015NewLine                                // write writebuffer...Di2015NewLine                                writeBuffer.Append(c);Di2015NewLine                                writer.Write(writeBuffer.ToString());Di2015NewLine                                writeBuffer.Clear();Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                writeBuffer.Append(c);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // unfortunately the streamwriter's dispose method closes the underlying stream, so e just flush itDi2015NewLine                    writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine                }                Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

11369508Di2015UniqueSeparatorCustomModelMetaData

11369988Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] Sha1ExceptEnd(Stream input, int bytesToOmit)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long bytesToRead = input.Length - bytesToOmit;Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[16 * 1024]; // Hash up to 16K at a timeDi2015NewLine    using (SHA1 sha1 = SHA1.Create())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (bytesToRead > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int thisPass = (int) Math.Min(buffer.Length, bytesToRead);Di2015NewLine            int bytesReadThisPass = input.Read(buffer, 0, thisPass);Di2015NewLine            if (bytesReadThisPass <= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new IOException("Unexpected end of data");Di2015NewLine            }  Di2015NewLine            sha1.TransformBlock(buffer, 0, bytesReadThisPass, buffer, 0);Di2015NewLine            bytesToRead -= bytesReadThisPass;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Flush the hashDi2015NewLine        sha1.TransformFinalBlock(buffer, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        return sha1.Hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11371404Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static char[] startingChars = new char[] { '<', '&' };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal static bool IsDangerousString(string s, out int matchIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    matchIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    int startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int num2 = s.IndexOfAny(startingChars, startIndex);Di2015NewLine        if (num2 < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (num2 == (s.Length - 1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        matchIndex = num2;Di2015NewLine        char ch = s[num2];Di2015NewLine        if (ch != '&')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((ch == '<') && ((IsAtoZ(s[num2 + 1]) || (s[num2 + 1] == '!')) || ((s[num2 + 1] == '/') || (s[num2 + 1] == '?'))))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (s[num2 + 1] == '#')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        startIndex = num2 + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool IsAtoZ(char c)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (((c >= 'a') && (c <= 'z')) || ((c >= 'A') && (c <= 'Z')));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11372759Di2015UniqueSeparator//Create a list of DateTimes including the start date, with the specifiedDi2015NewLine//number of days in between each item in the list.Di2015NewLinepublic static IList<DateTime> GetRepeatingEvents(DateTime start, DateTime end, int intervalInDays)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  List<DateTime> allEvents = new List<DateTime>();Di2015NewLine  allEvents.Add(start); //Make sure the start date is included in the list of dates!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var tempDate = start;Di2015NewLine  while (tempDate <= end) //Less than or Equals means the end date will be added as wellDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    tempDate = tempDate.AddDays(intervalInDays);Di2015NewLine    allEvents.Add(tempDate);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return allEvents;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11376295Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SortList<T>(List<T> dataSource, string fieldName, SortDirection sortDirection)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo propInfo = typeof(T).GetProperty(fieldName);Di2015NewLine    Comparison<T> compare = delegate(T a, T b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool asc = sortDirection == SortDirection.Ascending;Di2015NewLine        object valueA = asc ? propInfo.GetValue(a, null) : propInfo.GetValue(b, null);Di2015NewLine        object valueB = asc ? propInfo.GetValue(b, null) : propInfo.GetValue(a, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(valueA == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(valueB == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return asc ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(valueB == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return asc ? 1 : -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return valueA is IComparable ? ((IComparable)valueA).CompareTo(valueB) : 0;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    dataSource.Sort(compare);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11379799Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass HashArray<E> : HashTable<E> where E : IComparable<E> {Di2015NewLine    private E[] a;Di2015NewLine    private bool[] taken;Di2015NewLine    public readonly int n;Di2015NewLine    public int size {Di2015NewLine        get { return n; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HashArray(int m) {Di2015NewLine        n=2*m;Di2015NewLine        a=new E[n];Di2015NewLine        taken=new bool[n];Di2015NewLine        for (int i=0 ; i<n ; i++) taken[i]=false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void insert(E e) {Di2015NewLine        int index= GetSpecialHashCode(e)%n;Di2015NewLine        int i;Di2015NewLine        for (i=index ; i<n && taken[i]!=false ; ++i) ;Di2015NewLine        if (i>=n)Di2015NewLine            for (i=0 ; i<index && taken[i]!=false ; ++i) ;Di2015NewLine        if (i>=index) return;Di2015NewLine        taken[i]=true;Di2015NewLine        a[i]=e;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool isMember(E e) {Di2015NewLine        int i= GetSpecialHashCode(e)%n;Di2015NewLine        for ( ; i<n && taken[i]!=false && a[i].CompareTo(e)!=0 ; ++i );Di2015NewLine        if (i>=n || taken[i]==false) return false;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual int GetSpecialHashCode(E item) {Di2015NewLine        return item.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11380236Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        doc.Load("test.xml");Di2015NewLine        var dict = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLine        dict["A"] = 1;Di2015NewLine        dict["B"] = 0;Di2015NewLine        dict["C"] = 17;Di2015NewLine        var result = Evaluate(doc.FirstChild,dict);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static bool Evaluate(XmlNode node, IDictionary<string, int> dict)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (node.Name)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "Evaluate":Di2015NewLine                return Evaluate(node.FirstChild.NextSibling, dict); // Ignore first commentDi2015NewLine            case "Condition":Di2015NewLine                return Condition(node, dict);Di2015NewLine            case "AND":Di2015NewLine                return And(node, dict);Di2015NewLine            case "OR":Di2015NewLine                return Or(node, dict);Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool Or(XmlNode root, IDictionary<string, int> dict)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = false; // Starting with false, because It will be true when at least condition is trueDi2015NewLine        foreach (XmlNode node in root.ChildNodes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result |= Evaluate(node, dict);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool And(XmlNode root, IDictionary<string, int> dict)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = true;Di2015NewLine        foreach (XmlNode node in root.ChildNodes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result &= Evaluate(node, dict);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool Condition(XmlNode node, IDictionary<string, int> dict)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var name = node.Attributes["Name"].Value;Di2015NewLine        var value = node.Attributes["Value"].Value;Di2015NewLine        var opt = node.Attributes["Operator"].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (opt)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "==":Di2015NewLine                return dict[name] == int.Parse(value);Di2015NewLine            case "!=":Di2015NewLine                return dict[name] != int.Parse(value);Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11382760Di2015UniqueSeparator--Create a temp table to hold valuesDi2015NewLineCREATE TABLE #MyTable (Di2015NewLine[Rating as at] DATE,Di2015NewLine[Rating type] Nvarchar(30),Di2015NewLineRating FLOAT )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO #MyTable ([Rating as at],[Rating type],Rating) VALUES ('6/7/2012','Type1', 1)Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO #MyTable ([Rating as at],[Rating type],Rating) VALUES ('6/7/2012','Type2', 3)Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO #MyTable ([Rating as at],[Rating type],Rating) VALUES ('6/7/2012','Type3', 5)Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO #MyTable ([Rating as at],[Rating type],Rating) VALUES ('8/7/2012','Type1', 5)Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO #MyTable ([Rating as at],[Rating type],Rating) VALUES ('8/7/2012','Type2', 2)Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO #MyTable ([Rating as at],[Rating type],Rating) VALUES ('8/7/2012','Type3', 4)Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO #MyTable ([Rating as at],[Rating type],Rating) VALUES ('8/7/2012','Type4', 1)Di2015NewLineSELECT DISTINCT [Rating type] INTO #MyTableDistinct FROM #MyTableDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--Create a string of dynamic fieldsDi2015NewLineDECLARE @MyVar1 nvarchar(max),@MyVar2 nvarchar(max)Di2015NewLineSELECT @MyVar1 = COALESCE(@MyVar1,'') + '[' + [Rating type] + ']' + ', '  FROM #MyTableDistinct Di2015NewLineSELECT @MyVar1 = LEFT(@MyVar1, LEN(@MyVar1) - 1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--Create a string of dynamic CASE statements to be used to convert pivoted results to letter gradesDi2015NewLine--Update the CASE steatement to handle different grade typesDi2015NewLineSELECT @MyVar2 = COALESCE(@MyVar2,'') + 'CASE WHEN [' + [Rating type] + '] IS NULL THEN ''N/A'' WHEN [' + [Rating type] + '] > 4 THEN ''A'' WHEN [' + [Rating type] + '] > 3 THEN ''B'' WHEN [' + [Rating type] + '] > 2 THEN ''C'' ELSE ''F'' END AS [' + [Rating type] + '], '  FROM #MyTableDistinct Di2015NewLineSELECT @MyVar2 = LEFT(@MyVar2, LEN(@MyVar2) - 1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--Build a SQL string to be later executeDi2015NewLine--This is where all of the PIVOT magic happensDi2015NewLineDECLARE @MySQLStatement nvarchar(max)Di2015NewLineSET @MySQLStatement = 'SELECT [Rating as at],' + @MyVar1 +  ' INTO #MyPivotTable FROM Di2015NewLine    (SELECT [Rating as at],[Rating type],Rating from #MyTable) AS p1Di2015NewLine    PIVOT (Di2015NewLine        avg(Rating) FOR [Rating type] IN (' + @MyVar1 + ') Di2015NewLine    ) as p2;SELECT [Rating as at], ' + @MyVar2 + ' FROM #MyPivotTable;DROP TABLE #MyPivotTable;'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--Execute the SQL stringDi2015NewLineEXEC(@MySQLStatement)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDROP TABLE #MyTableDistinctDi2015NewLineDROP TABLE #MyTableDi2015NewLine

11383374Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class WebBrowserExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static string GetYouTubeVideoPlayerHTML(string videoCode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const string YOUTUBE_URL = @"http://www.youtube.com/v/";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sb.Append("<html>");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("    <head>");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("        <meta name=\\"viewport\\" content=\\"width=device-width; height=device-height;\\">");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("    </head>");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("    <body marginheight=\\"0\\" marginwidth=\\"0\\" leftmargin=\\"0\\" topmargin=\\"0\\" style=\\"overflow-y: hidden\\">");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("        <object width=\\"100%\\" height=\\"100%\\">");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("            <param name=\\"movie\\" value=\\"" + YOUTUBE_URL + videoCode + "?version=3&rel=0\\" />");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("            <param name=\\"allowFullScreen\\" value=\\"true\\" />");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("            <param name=\\"allowscriptaccess\\" value=\\"always\\" />");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("            <embed src=\\"" + YOUTUBE_URL + videoCode + "?version=3&rel=0\\" type=\\"application/x-shockwave-flash\\"");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("                   width=\\"100%\\" height=\\"100%\\" allowscriptaccess=\\"always\\" allowfullscreen=\\"true\\" />");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("        </object>");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("    </body>");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("</html>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ShowYouTubeVideo(this WebBrowser webBrowser, string videoCode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(webBrowser == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("webBrowser");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        webBrowser.NavigateToString(GetYouTubeVideoPlayerHTML(videoCode));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

So you should now modify Di2015NewLine        // Initialize() so that it calls this method instead.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int screenWidth = GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Width;Di2015NewLine        float xPosition = Shared.Random.Next(0, screenWidth);Di2015NewLine        asteroids.Add(new Asteroid(new Vector2(xPosition, 0)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void Update(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // ... other stuff ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        asteroidSpawnTimer += (float)gameTime.ElapsedGameTime.TotalSeconds;Di2015NewLine        if(asteroidSpawnTimer >= asteroidSpawnDelay)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            asteroidSpawnTimer -= asteroidSpawnDelay; // subtract "used" timeDi2015NewLine            CreateAsteroid();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11383467Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Game1 : Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override void Update(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // ... other stuff ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int screenHeight = GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Loop backwards through all asteroids.Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // Note that you must iterate backwards when removing items from a list Di2015NewLine        // by index, as removing an item will change the indices of all items inDi2015NewLine        // the list following (in a forward order) the item that you remove.Di2015NewLine        for(int i = asteroids.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(asteroids[i].Position.Y > screenHeight)Di2015NewLine                asteroids.RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11384030Di2015UniqueSeparatorFor debugger support only
11384039Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// LaunchProcess As User Overloaded for Window Mode Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="cmdLine"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="token"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="envBlock"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="WindowMode"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static bool LaunchProcessAsUser(string cmdLine, IntPtr token, IntPtr envBlock,uint WindowMode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool result = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PROCESS_INFORMATION pi = new PROCESS_INFORMATION();Di2015NewLine        SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES saProcess = new SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES();Di2015NewLine        SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES saThread = new SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES();Di2015NewLine        saProcess.nLength = (uint)Marshal.SizeOf(saProcess);Di2015NewLine        saThread.nLength = (uint)Marshal.SizeOf(saThread);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        STARTUPINFO si = new STARTUPINFO();Di2015NewLine        si.cb = (uint)Marshal.SizeOf(si);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //if this member is NULL, the new process inherits the desktopDi2015NewLine        //and window station of its parent process. If this member isDi2015NewLine        //an empty string, the process does not inherit the desktop andDi2015NewLine        //window station of its parent process; instead, the systemDi2015NewLine        //determines if a new desktop and window station need to be created.Di2015NewLine        //If the impersonated user already has a desktop, the system uses theDi2015NewLine        //existing desktop.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        si.lpDesktop = @"WinSta0\\Default"; //Default Vista/7 Desktop SessionDi2015NewLine        si.dwFlags = STARTF_USESHOWWINDOW | STARTF_FORCEONFEEDBACK;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Check the Startup Mode of the Process Di2015NewLine        if (WindowMode == 1)Di2015NewLine            si.wShowWindow = SW_SHOW;Di2015NewLine        else if (WindowMode == 2)Di2015NewLine        { //Do NothingDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (WindowMode == 3)Di2015NewLine            si.wShowWindow = 0; //Hide Window Di2015NewLine        else if (WindowMode == 4)Di2015NewLine            si.wShowWindow = 3; //Maximize WindowDi2015NewLine        else if (WindowMode == 5)Di2015NewLine            si.wShowWindow = 6; //Minimize WindowDi2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            si.wShowWindow = SW_SHOW;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Set other si properties as required.Di2015NewLine        result = CreateProcessAsUser(Di2015NewLine        token,Di2015NewLine        null,Di2015NewLine        cmdLine,Di2015NewLine        ref saProcess,Di2015NewLine        ref saThread,Di2015NewLine        false,Di2015NewLine        CREATE_UNICODE_ENVIRONMENT,Di2015NewLine        envBlock,Di2015NewLine        null,Di2015NewLine        ref si,Di2015NewLine        out pi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (result == false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int error = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine            string message = String.Format("CreateProcessAsUser Error: {0}", error);Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine(message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11385230Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic byte HexToByte(string value, int offset)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   string hex = value.Substring(offset, 2);Di2015NewLine   return byte.Parse(hex, NumberStyles.HexNumber);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic short HexToSigned16(string value, bool isLittleEndian)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   byte first = HexToByte(value, 0);Di2015NewLine   byte second = HexToByte(value, 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (isLittleEndian) Di2015NewLine       return (short)(first | (second << 8));Di2015NewLine   elseDi2015NewLine       return (short)(second | (first << 8));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring[] values = "AAFE B4FE B8FE".Split();Di2015NewLineforeach (string value in values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   Console.WriteLine("{0} == {1}", value, HexToSigned16(value, true));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11385721Di2015UniqueSeparatorArticle article; // from post action parametersDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<int> categoryIds; // from post action parametersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var ctx = new MyDbContext())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Load original article from DB including its current categoriesDi2015NewLine    var articleInDb = ctx.Articles.Include(a => a.Categories)Di2015NewLine        .Single(a => a.ArticleId == article.ArticleId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Update scalar properties of the articleDi2015NewLine    ctx.Entry(articleInDb).CurrentValues.SetValues(article);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Remove categories that are not in the id list anymoreDi2015NewLine    foreach (var categoryInDb in articleInDb.Categories.ToList())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!categoryIds.Contains(categoryInDb.CategoryId))Di2015NewLine            articleInDb.Categories.Remove(categoryInDb);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add categories that are not in the DB list but in id listDi2015NewLine    foreach (var categoryId in categoryIds)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!articleInDb.Categories.Any(c => c.CategoryId == categoryId))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var category = new Category { CategoryId = categoryId };Di2015NewLine            ctx.Categories.Attach(category); // this avoids duplicate categoriesDi2015NewLine            articleInDb.Categories.Add(category);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ctx.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11392829Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DispatcherExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<string, DispatcherTimer> timers =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<string, DispatcherTimer>();Di2015NewLine    private static readonly object syncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void DelayInvoke(this Dispatcher dispatcher, string namedInvocation,Di2015NewLine        Action action, TimeSpan delay,Di2015NewLine        DispatcherPriority priority = DispatcherPriority.Normal)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (syncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RemoveTimer(namedInvocation);Di2015NewLine            var timer = new DispatcherTimer(delay, priority, (s, e) => action(), dispatcher);Di2015NewLine            timer.Start();Di2015NewLine            timers.Add(namedInvocation, timer);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void CancelNamedInvocation(this Dispatcher dispatcher, string namedInvocation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (syncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RemoveTimer(namedInvocation);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void RemoveTimer(string namedInvocation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!timers.ContainsKey(namedInvocation)) return;Di2015NewLine        timers[namedInvocation].Stop();Di2015NewLine        timers.Remove(namedInvocation);Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
11392829Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate object _property;  Di2015NewLinepublic object Property  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    get { return _property; }  Di2015NewLine    set  Di2015NewLine    {  Di2015NewLine        if (_property != value)  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            _property = value;  Di2015NewLine            Dispatcher.DelayInvoke("PropertyChanged_Property",(Action)(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                 RaisePropertyChanged("Property");   Di2015NewLine            }),TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(500));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

11394543Di2015UniqueSeparator    private string[] splitToBlocks(string data, int numBlocks, char sep)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // We return an array of the request lengthDi2015NewLine        if (numBlocks <= 1 || data.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new string [] { data };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] result = new string[numBlocks];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The optimal size of each blockDi2015NewLine        int blockLen = (data.Length / numBlocks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int idx = 0; int pos = 0; int lastSepPos = blockLen;Di2015NewLine        while (idx < numBlocks)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Search backwards for the first sep starting from the lastSepPosDi2015NewLine            char c = data[lastSepPos];Di2015NewLine            while (c != sep) { lastSepPos--; c = data[lastSepPos]; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the block data in the result arrayDi2015NewLine            result[idx] = data.Substring(pos, (lastSepPos + 1) - pos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Reposition for then next blockDi2015NewLine            idx++;Di2015NewLine            pos = lastSepPos + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(idx == numBlocks-1)Di2015NewLine                lastSepPos = data.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                lastSepPos = blockLen * (idx + 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11396039Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CleanStringDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //by MSDN http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/844skk0h(v=vs.71).aspxDi2015NewLine    public static string UseRegex(string strIn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Replace invalid characters with empty strings.Di2015NewLine        return Regex.Replace(strIn, @"[^\\w\\.@-]", "");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // by Paolo TedescoDi2015NewLine    public static String UseStringBuilder(string strIn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const string removeChars = " ?&^$#@!()+-,:;<>â€™\\'-_*";Di2015NewLine        // specify capacity of StringBuilder to avoid resizingDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(strIn.Length);Di2015NewLine        foreach (char x in strIn.Where(c => !removeChars.Contains(c)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(x);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // by Paolo Tedesco, but using a HashSetDi2015NewLine    public static String UseStringBuilderWithHashSet(string strIn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var hashSet = new HashSet<char>(" ?&^$#@!()+-,:;<>â€™\\'-_*");Di2015NewLine        // specify capacity of StringBuilder to avoid resizingDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(strIn.Length);Di2015NewLine        foreach (char x in strIn.Where(c => !hashSet.Contains(c)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(x);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // by SteveDogDi2015NewLine    public static string UseStringBuilderWithHashSet2(string dirtyString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HashSet<char> removeChars = new HashSet<char>(" ?&^$#@!()+-,:;<>â€™\\'-_*");Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder(dirtyString.Length);Di2015NewLine        foreach (char c in dirtyString)Di2015NewLine            if (removeChars.Contains(c))Di2015NewLine                result.Append(c);Di2015NewLine        return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // original by patel.milanbDi2015NewLine    public static string UseReplace(string dirtyString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string removeChars = " ?&^$#@!()+-,:;<>â€™\\'-_*";Di2015NewLine        string result = dirtyString;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (char c in removeChars)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = result.Replace(c.ToString(), string.Empty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // by L.BDi2015NewLine    public static string UseWhere(string dirtyString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new String(dirtyString.Where(Char.IsLetterOrDigit).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The main entry point for the application.Di2015NewLine    /// 11400967Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringBuilder
11400967Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar content = "the quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog";Di2015NewLinevar searchText = "the";Di2015NewLinevar sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLinevar idx = -1; // will hold the index of our search textDi2015NewLinevar uncopiedIdx = 0; // the start index of what hasn't been copied yetDi2015NewLinevar replacementCount = 0;Di2015NewLinewhile( (idx = content.IndexOf( searchText, idx+1 )) != -1 ) {Di2015NewLine    // copy everything leading up to our search textDi2015NewLine    sb.Append( content.Substring( uncopiedIdx, idx-uncopiedIdx ) );Di2015NewLine    // copy the replacement text, with the replacement countDi2015NewLine    var replacement = "(" + replacementCount++ + ")";Di2015NewLine    sb.Append( replacement );Di2015NewLine    // skip over the search textDi2015NewLine    uncopiedIdx = idx + searchText.Length;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// copy everything after the last matchDi2015NewLinesb.Append( content.Substring( uncopiedIdx ) );Di2015NewLine

11401202Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Axis scales a min/max value appropriately for the purpose of graphsDi2015NewLine/// <remarks>Code taken and modified from http://peltiertech.com/WordPress/calculate-nice-axis-scales-in-excel-vba/</remarks>Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic struct Axis Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public readonly float min_value;Di2015NewLine    public readonly float max_value;Di2015NewLine    public readonly float major_step;Di2015NewLine    public readonly float minor_step;Di2015NewLine    public readonly int major_count;Di2015NewLine    public readonly int minor_count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initialize Axis from range of values. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="x_min">Low end of range to be included</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="x_max">High end of range to be included</param>Di2015NewLine    public Axis(float x_min, float x_max)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Check if the max and min are the sameDi2015NewLine        if(x_min==x_max)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            x_max*=1.01f;Di2015NewLine            x_min/=1.01f;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //Check if dMax is bigger than dMin - swap them if notDi2015NewLine        if(x_max<x_min)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            float temp = x_min;Di2015NewLine            x_min = x_max;Di2015NewLine            x_max = temp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Make dMax a little bigger and dMin a little smaller (by 1% of their difference)Di2015NewLine        float delta=(x_max-x_min)/2;Di2015NewLine        float  x_mid=(x_max+x_min)/2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x_max=x_mid+1.01f*delta;Di2015NewLine        x_min=x_mid-1.01f*delta;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //What if they are both 0?Di2015NewLine        if(x_max==0&&x_min==0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            x_max=1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //This bit rounds the maximum and minimum values to reasonable valuesDi2015NewLine        //to chart.  If not done, the axis numbers will look very sillyDi2015NewLine        //Find the range of values coveredDi2015NewLine        double pwr=Math.Log(x_max-x_min)/Math.Log(10);Di2015NewLine        double scl=Math.Pow(10, pwr-Math.Floor(pwr));Di2015NewLine        //Find the scaling factorDi2015NewLine        if(scl>0&&scl<=2.5)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            major_step=0.2f;Di2015NewLine            minor_step=0.05f;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if(scl>2.5&&scl<5)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            major_step=0.5f;Di2015NewLine            minor_step=0.1f;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if(scl>5&&scl<7.5)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            major_step=1f;Di2015NewLine            minor_step=0.2f;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            major_step=2f;Di2015NewLine            minor_step=0.5f;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.major_step=(float)(Math.Pow(10, Math.Floor(pwr))*major_step);Di2015NewLine        this.minor_step=(float)(Math.Pow(10, Math.Floor(pwr))*minor_step);Di2015NewLine        this.major_count=(int)Math.Ceiling((x_max-x_min)/major_step);Di2015NewLine        this.minor_count=(int)Math.Ceiling((x_max-x_min)/minor_step);Di2015NewLine        int i_1=(int)Math.Floor(x_min/major_step);Di2015NewLine        int i_2=(int)Math.Ceiling(x_max/major_step);Di2015NewLine        this.min_value=i_1*major_step;Di2015NewLine        this.max_value=i_2*major_step;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public float[] MajorRangeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            float[] res=new float[major_count+1];Di2015NewLine            for(int i=0; i<res.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                res[i]=min_value+major_step*i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return res;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public float[] MinorRangeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            float[] res=new float[minor_count+1];Di2015NewLine            for(int i=0; i<res.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                res[i]=min_value+minor_step*i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return res;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11401260Di2015UniqueSeparatorint add(int a, int b){ return a + b; }Di2015NewLineint add_f(float a, float b){ return a + b; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint (*f)(); // empty argument list does NOT mean zero arguments.Di2015NewLine            // for zero arguments, say int (*)(void)Di2015NewLinef = &add;Di2015NewLinef = &add_f;Di2015NewLine
11401260Di2015UniqueSeparator#include <iostream>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint add(int a, int b){ return a + b; }Di2015NewLineint add_f(float a, float b){ return a + b; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineunion {Di2015NewLine    int (*f1)(int, int);Di2015NewLine    int (*f2)(float, float);Di2015NewLine} fp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint main(void)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    fp.f1 = &add;Di2015NewLine    std::cout << "Expected (1): " << add(1, 3) << std::endl;Di2015NewLine    std::cout << "Actual   (1): " << (fp.f1)(1, 3) << std::endl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    std::cout << "Expected (2): " << add(1.0f, 3.0f) << std::endl;Di2015NewLine    std::cout << "Actual   (2): " << (fp.f2)(1.0f, 3.0f) << std::endl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fp.f2 = &add_f;Di2015NewLine    std::cout << "Expected (3): " << add_f(1.0f, 3.0f) << std::endl;Di2015NewLine    std::cout << "Actual   (3): " << (fp.f2)(1.0f, 3.0f) << std::endl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    std::cout << "Expected (4): " << add_f(1, 3) << std::endl;Di2015NewLine    std::cout << "Actual   (4): " << (fp.f1)(1, 3) << std::endl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11402188Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int WordCount(string haystack, string needle) {Di2015NewLine    if (needle == null) {Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string[] source = haystack.Split(new char[] { '.', '?', '!', ' ', ';', ':', ',' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine    var matchQuery = from word in sourceDi2015NewLine                        where word.ToLowerInvariant() == needle.ToLowerInvariant()Di2015NewLine                        select word;Di2015NewLine    return matchQuery.Count();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11402631Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.Configuration;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.Security;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.UI;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.UI.WebControls;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.UI.HtmlControls;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TestDivLockScreenDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Helper to "Synchronizer Token Pattern".Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class SynchronizerTokenDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly string SESSION_KEY_TOKEN = "TestDivLockScreen.SynchronizedToken.SESSION_KEY_TOKEN";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns a new token and positions it for validation of next request.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static string NewToken()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string token = Guid.NewGuid().ToString("N");Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Session.Add(SESSION_KEY_TOKEN, token);Di2015NewLine            return token;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns the value of the current token. Renew if the current token is null.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static string CurrentToken()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string token = HttpContext.Current.Session[SESSION_KEY_TOKEN] as string;Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(token))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                token = NewToken();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return token;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Checks if the token matches the token of last call to NewToken.Di2015NewLine        /// The removal of the token is only made after a new call NewToken.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="token"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static bool IsCurrentToken(string token)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string currentToken = HttpContext.Current.Session[SESSION_KEY_TOKEN] as string;Di2015NewLine            if (currentToken == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (currentToken.Equals(token))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Do the same as IsCurrentToken. However loads a new "token value"Di2015NewLine        /// in the session. Is "Thread Safe"!Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="token"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static bool IsCurrentTokenRenew(string token)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (HttpContext.Current.Session)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string currentToken = CurrentToken();Di2015NewLine                NewToken();Di2015NewLine                if (currentToken.Equals(token))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11402631Di2015UniqueSeparator<asp:HiddenField ID="HdfSyncToken" runat="server" />Di2015NewLine
11402631Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Pre_Render(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //repositioning tokenDi2015NewLine    this.HdfSyncToken.Value = SynchronizerToken.CurrentToken();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Refresh GridViewDi2015NewLine    this.GrvRecords.DataSource = this.Records;Di2015NewLine    this.GrvRecords.DataBind();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void BtnInsertST_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Abort second execution for the same value of the tokenDi2015NewLine    if (!SynchronizerToken.IsCurrentTokenRenew(this.HdfSyncToken.Value))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ClientScript.RegisterStartupScript(this.GetType(), "alert", "<script type='text/javascript'>alert('Request has already been answered!');</script>");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Insert Record (token validation OK)Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.InsertRecord();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11411406Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TwitterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private TwitterService service;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private OAuthRequestToken requestToken;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Twitter(String consumerKey, String consumerSecret)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        service = new TwitterService(consumerKey, consumerSecret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        requestToken = service.GetRequestToken();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Login(String username, String password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Uri uri = service.GetAuthorizationUri(requestToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CookieContainer cookieContainer = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String response = HttpUtil.GetResponseString(uri, cookieContainer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int startIndex = response.IndexOf("authenticity_token\\" type=\\"hidden\\" value=\\"") + 41;Di2015NewLine        int endIndex = response.IndexOf("\\"", startIndex + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String authenticity_token = response.Substring(startIndex, endIndex - startIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        startIndex = response.IndexOf("name=\\"oauth_token\\" type=\\"hidden\\" value=\\"") + 40;Di2015NewLine        endIndex = response.IndexOf("\\"", startIndex + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String oauth_token = response.Substring(startIndex, endIndex - startIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String postData = "authenticity_token=" + authenticity_token +Di2015NewLine                          "&oauth_token=" + oauth_token +Di2015NewLine                          "&session%5Busername_or_email%5D=" + username +Di2015NewLine                          "&session%5Bpassword%5D=" + password;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        response = HttpUtil.GetResponseString(new Uri("https://api.twitter.com/oauth/authorize"), postData, cookieContainer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (response.Contains("Invalid user name or password"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        startIndex = response.IndexOf("<code>") + 6;Di2015NewLine        endIndex = response.IndexOf("</code>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String pin = response.Substring(startIndex, endIndex - startIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        OAuthAccessToken access = service.GetAccessToken(requestToken, pin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        service.AuthenticateWith(access.Token, access.TokenSecret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<TwitterStatus> GetMentiones()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return service.ListTweetsMentioningMe().ToList<TwitterStatus>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11411406Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class HttpUtilDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static String GetResponseString(Uri url, CookieContainer cc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine        request.Method = WebRequestMethods.Http.Get;Di2015NewLine        request.CookieContainer = cc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String responseString = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        response.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return responseString;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static String GetResponseString(Uri url, String postData, CookieContainer cc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine        request.Method = WebRequestMethods.Http.Post;Di2015NewLine        request.ContentLength = postData.Length;Di2015NewLine        request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine        request.CookieContainer = cc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StreamWriter writer = new StreamWriter(request.GetRequestStream());Di2015NewLine        writer.Write(postData);Di2015NewLine        writer.Close();Di2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine        String responseString = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        response.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return responseString;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11413660Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Encrypt(string toEncrypt, bool useHashing)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] keyArray;Di2015NewLine    byte[] toEncryptArray = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(toEncrypt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Configuration.AppSettingsReader settingsReader = Di2015NewLine                                        new AppSettingsReader();Di2015NewLine    // Get the key from config fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string key = (string)settingsReader.GetValue("SecurityKey", Di2015NewLine                                                     typeof(String));Di2015NewLine    //System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show(key);Di2015NewLine    //If hashing use get hashcode regards to your keyDi2015NewLine    if (useHashing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MD5CryptoServiceProvider hashmd5 = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        keyArray = hashmd5.ComputeHash(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key));Di2015NewLine        //Always release the resources and flush dataDi2015NewLine        // of the Cryptographic service provide. Best PracticeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        hashmd5.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        keyArray = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider tdes = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    //set the secret key for the tripleDES algorithmDi2015NewLine    tdes.Key = keyArray;Di2015NewLine    //mode of operation. there are other 4 modes.Di2015NewLine    //We choose ECB(Electronic code Book)Di2015NewLine    tdes.Mode = CipherMode.ECB;Di2015NewLine    //padding mode(if any extra byte added)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tdes.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ICryptoTransform cTransform = tdes.CreateEncryptor();Di2015NewLine    //transform the specified region of bytes array to resultArrayDi2015NewLine    byte[] resultArray = Di2015NewLine      cTransform.TransformFinalBlock(toEncryptArray, 0, Di2015NewLine      toEncryptArray.Length);Di2015NewLine    //Release resources held by TripleDes EncryptorDi2015NewLine    tdes.Clear();Di2015NewLine    //Return the encrypted data into unreadable string formatDi2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(resultArray, 0, resultArray.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11413660Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Decrypt(string cipherString, bool useHashing)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] keyArray;Di2015NewLine    //get the byte code of the stringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] toEncryptArray = Convert.FromBase64String(cipherString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Configuration.AppSettingsReader settingsReader = Di2015NewLine                                        new AppSettingsReader();Di2015NewLine    //Get your key from config file to open the lock!Di2015NewLine    string key = (string)settingsReader.GetValue("SecurityKey", Di2015NewLine                                                 typeof(String));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (useHashing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //if hashing was used get the hash code with regards to your keyDi2015NewLine        MD5CryptoServiceProvider hashmd5 = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        keyArray = hashmd5.ComputeHash(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key));Di2015NewLine        //release any resource held by the MD5CryptoServiceProviderDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        hashmd5.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //if hashing was not implemented get the byte code of the keyDi2015NewLine        keyArray = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider tdes = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    //set the secret key for the tripleDES algorithmDi2015NewLine    tdes.Key = keyArray;Di2015NewLine    //mode of operation. there are other 4 modes. Di2015NewLine    //We choose ECB(Electronic code Book)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tdes.Mode = CipherMode.ECB;Di2015NewLine    //padding mode(if any extra byte added)Di2015NewLine    tdes.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ICryptoTransform cTransform = tdes.CreateDecryptor();Di2015NewLine    byte[] resultArray = cTransform.TransformFinalBlock(Di2015NewLine                         toEncryptArray, 0, toEncryptArray.Length);Di2015NewLine    //Release resources held by TripleDes Encryptor                Di2015NewLine    tdes.Clear();Di2015NewLine    //return the Clear decrypted TEXTDi2015NewLine    return UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetString(resultArray);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11415941Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SearchResult{Di2015NewLine    public int ID { get; set; } Di2015NewLine    public string Title{ get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<SearchResult> list = new List<SearchResult>() {Di2015NewLine        new SearchResult(){ID=4,Title="Wie man BBA reman erreicht"},Di2015NewLine        new SearchResult(){ID=5,Title="Ersatz Airbags, Gurtstrammer und Auto KÃ¶rper Teile "},Di2015NewLine        new SearchResult(){ID=6,Title="JCB Excavator - ECU P/N: 728/35700"},Di2015NewLine        new SearchResult(){ID=2,Title="Geo Prism 1995 GEO - ABS #16213899"},Di2015NewLine        new SearchResult(){ID=3,Title="Geo Prism 1995 - ABS #16213899"},Di2015NewLine        new SearchResult(){ID=1,Title="Geo Prism 1995 GEO GEO- ABS #16213899"},Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var to_search = new[] { "Geo", "JCB" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = from sr in listDi2015NewLine                 let w = to_search.FirstOrDefault(ts => sr.Title.ToLower().Contains(ts.ToLower()))Di2015NewLine                 where w != nullDi2015NewLine                 let a = new {sr=sr, word=w.ToLower()}Di2015NewLine                 group a by a.word into gDi2015NewLine                 orderby g.Count() descendingDi2015NewLine                 let sorted = g.OrderByDescending(a=> a.sr.Title.Select((c, i) => a.sr.Title.Substring(i)).Count(sub => sub.ToLower().StartsWith(a.word)))Di2015NewLine                 from a in sorted Di2015NewLine                 select a.sr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var completeList = result.Concat(list.Except(result));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var element in completeList)Di2015NewLine        Debug.WriteLine(String.Format("ID={0},Title={1}", element.ID, element.Title));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11416496Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static System.Drawing.Image DownloadImage(string source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Image image = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // used to fetch contentDi2015NewLine        var client = new HttpClient();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // used to store image dataDi2015NewLine        var memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Blogger tacks on a -h to an image Url to link to an HTML page insteadDi2015NewLine            if (source.Contains("-h/"))Di2015NewLine                source = source.Replace("-h/", "/");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // fetch the imageDi2015NewLine            var response = client.GetAsync(source).Result;Di2015NewLine            response.EnsureSuccessStatusCode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var contentType = response.Content.Headers.ContentType.MediaType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!contentType.StartsWith("image/"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine(contentType);Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Specified source did not return an image");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var imageStream = response.Content.ReadAsStreamAsync().Result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // instantiate a system.drawing.image from the dataDi2015NewLine            image = System.Drawing.Bitmap.FromStream(imageStream, true, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // save the image data to a memory streamDi2015NewLine            image.Save(memoryStream, image.RawFormat);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (HttpRequestException exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // sometimes, we'll get a 404 or other unexpected responseDi2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine("{0} {1}", exception.Message, source);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (IOException exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine("{0} {1}", exception.Message, source);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ArgumentException exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // sometimes, an image will link to a web page, resulting in this exceptionDi2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine("{0} {1}", exception.Message, source);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // clean up our disposable resourcesDi2015NewLine            client.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            memoryStream.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return image;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

11422969Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Proxy for executing generic service methodsDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class ServiceProxyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Execute service method and get return valueDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="C">Type of service</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">Type of return value</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="action">Delegate for implementing the service method</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Object of type T</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T Execute<C, T>(Func<C, T> action) where C : class, ICommunicationObject, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        C svc = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T result = default(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            svc = new C();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result = action.Invoke(svc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            svc.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (FaultException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Logging goes hereDi2015NewLine            // Service Name: svc.GetType().NameDi2015NewLine            // Method Name: action.Method.NameDi2015NewLine            // Duration: You could note the time before/after the service call and calculate the differenceDi2015NewLine            // Exception: ex.Reason.ToString()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (svc != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                svc.Abort();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Logging goes hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (svc != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                svc.Abort();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11425302Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool IsBetween(DateTime now, TimeSpan open, TimeSpan close)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var nowTime = now.TimeOfDay;Di2015NewLine    return (open < closeDi2015NewLine        // if open is before close, then now must be between themDi2015NewLine        ? (nowTime > open && nowTime < close)Di2015NewLine        // otherwise now must be *either* after open or before closeDi2015NewLine        : (nowTime > open || nowTime < close));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

11425886Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string RunScript(string scriptText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // create Powershell runspaceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Runspace runspace = RunspaceFactory.CreateRunspace();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // open itDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    runspace.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create a pipeline and feed it the script textDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Pipeline pipeline = runspace.CreatePipeline();Di2015NewLine    pipeline.Commands.AddScript(scriptText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // add an extra command to transform the scriptDi2015NewLine    // output objects into nicely formatted stringsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // remove this line to get the actual objectsDi2015NewLine    // that the script returns. For example, the scriptDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // "Get-Process" returns a collectionDi2015NewLine    // of System.Diagnostics.Process instances.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    pipeline.Commands.Add("Out-String");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // execute the scriptDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Collection<psobject /> results = pipeline.Invoke();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // close the runspaceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    runspace.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // convert the script result into a single stringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder stringBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (PSObject obj in results)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        stringBuilder.AppendLine(obj.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return stringBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
11425889Di2015UniqueSeparatorFileStream
11425889Di2015UniqueSeparatorFileStream
11425889Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Security.Principal;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Permissions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ImpersonatedFileCopy : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine
